description: Surrogate primary key for the repair location record; uniquely identifies a location within this table.
Timestamp when this record was created or last replicated/updated, likely in yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm format; used for incremental loads and auditing; confirm exact timezone/semantics with SME.
Code for the top organizational hierarchy level associated with the repair location; 0 may indicate no parent/root; exact meaning varies by tenant - confirm with SME.
Readable label corresponding to the hierarchy level 1 code, likely the name/description of that organizational grouping; confirm with SME.
Official name of the repair facility/vendor where vehicles are serviced or parts obtained.
Organization or tenant identifier tied to this record; 0 may represent a default/global scope; confirm with SME.
Identifier for this location in the originating legacy system to support cross-system mapping and deduplication.
Name of the source table in the legacy system from which this record was imported.
